Salinas.B. V. Sargent House:
The B. V. Sargent House, also known as Sargent House and located at 154 Central Ave. in Salinas, California, is a historic house that is listed on the National Register of Historic Places that is believed to have represented a great change in local building styles and to have opened popularity in the area for colonial decorative architecture.
It was built in 1897 and is a work of architect William H. Weeks.
